DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : The amount type fat diet may affect hormone level , bone mineral density , breast density later life . This may affect risk develop breast cancer . Learning long-term effect diet hormone level , bone mineral density , breast density may help study breast cancer future . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study long-term effect adolescent diet hormone breast cancer risk woman previously enrol Dietary Intervention Study Children .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Effect Adolescent Diet Hormones Breast Cancer Risk Women Previously Enrolled Dietary Intervention Study Children
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine long-term effect Dietary Intervention Study Children ( DISC ) low total fat saturate fat intake adolescence serum progesterone level young woman previously enrol DISC study . Secondary - Determine long-term effect DISC intervention serum estradiol level woman . - Determine long-term effect DISC intervention bone mineral density woman . - Determine long-term effect DISC intervention breast density woman . - Determine long-term effect DISC intervention prevalence metabolic syndrome woman . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo fast blood collection day 1 assessment serum hormone ( progesterone , estradiol ) , lipid , lipoprotein , fast glucose . Patients also undergo blood pressure , height , weight , waist circumference measurement . Patient receive snack complete Modifiable Activity questionnaire , Center Epidemiological Studies Depression Scale short form , Spielberger State-Trait Anxiety Inventory , Dietary Intervention Study Children Medical History questionnaire ( include demographic , medical history , menstrual history , medication , reproductive history , dietary supplement , alcohol tobacco use , family history cancer ) . Patients also undergo dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) MRI measure bone breast density . Patients complete in-person 24-hour dietary recall use Nutrition Data System Research day 1 via telephone week 2 3 . Day 1 schedule patient 's luteal phase menstrual cycle . After completion study , patient contact clinic report start next menses . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 301 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Previously enrol clinical trial title , `` Dietary Intervention Study Children '' PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
